name: Plane and Aliens
description:
The aliens is invading our planet. Fight through waves of alien spaceships to save the earth.

Controls:

  • On Browser : Use the arrowkeys to control your plane. 
  • On Android: Touch the upper half of your screen to move up and touch the bottom half of your screen to move down.
  • On Desktop : Use the arrowkeys to control your plane. Press Alt-left to shoot. Press Control-left to auto-shoot.

Credits:

  • Font: http://www.dafont.com/education-is-a-way.font
  • Music: https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
  • Sound: https://kenney.nl/assets/digital-audio
